comment.author: Anna
comment.text: Wait wait wait. Did he forget he would be in jail for tax evasion.... Hm

replies.author: Dylan
replies.text: He declared a 916 million dollar loss which would allow him to avoid paying taxes while being audited but that's just federal taxes he still pays all his other taxes

replies.author: Anna
replies.text: 916 million dollar loss... Sounds like a good president

replies.author: Anna
replies.text: Also if you would read full articles. It states. Yea 916 million has covered him not paying taxes for all these years but... Even before that. Theres records of trump(his tax returns before the 916 million dollar loss) and he still.. Guess what? Wasnt paying his taxes. Says he didn't pay any if at all taxes 5 years prior to his "916 millions dollar loss" so... Yea

replies.author: Dylan
replies.text: Successful people fail more than an unsuccessful person tries you don't always gain jarred sometimes you lose its how you act after the loss that defines you and obviously he did just fine
